timeline.message:
Filter empty fields in SearchHit#toXContent

This commit restores the filtering of empty fields during the
xcontent serialization of SearchHit. The filtering was removed
unintentionally in #41656.

timeline.bodyText: It would be great to have a a test for this too.
timeline.author: cbuescher
cbuescher

timeline.bodyText: Can we also check that the fields object is not only empty in the xContent rendering but really not present? I think the parsed object would contain an empty map regardless.
